name: Trapped (itch) (TeekyBird)
description:
Description

Trapped is a first-person horror game where one day you appear in an abandoned mysterious house and you have to escape. All you need to do to escape is find the 3 key card pieces but it isn't going to be simple. The house changes over time. It will be locking and unlocking doors and making objects appear or disappear. There is also some metal suits lying in here but I am sure they won't hurt you. Figure out why you are here and escape the house.

Includes

  • 6 Nights
  • 1 - 2 hours of content

Controls

W,A,S and D keys to move
Left Shift to run
Left Mouse to interact with/pick up objects
Right Mouse to turn ON/OFF the Flashlight
Space to drop objects
Hold Escape to quit the night
